sentence.Network_en: The idea has been given short shrift by philosophers.
sentence.Network_cn: 哲学家们并未怎么关注这一观点。

sentence.Network_en: He gave short shrift to criticisms of Government policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他毫不关心人们对政府政策所提出的批评.

sentence.Network_en: All idle talk wasted our time and we should give It'short shrift.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的闲谈浪费我们时间和我们将去给它短暂忏悔时间.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 口译词汇连载（不断更新中）_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... Shrewd 狡猾的 Shrift 忏悔 Shroud 遮蔽.
shriftshrift 承认 , 临终忏悔 , 招认 , 忏悔.
大学体验英语(四) ... shift 转变, 移动, 转移 shrift 忏悔，悔悟，招认 shrink 缩小.
he gave short shrift to criticisms of Government policy .他毫不关心人们对政府政策所提出的批评。

list.abs: ...**Short horse soon curried "矮马容易刷洗；小事易办Short shrift 不理会；忽视；轻视Shortchange "（给顾客）少找钱.
We got short shrift ., 我们受到了冷遇.
Of this breed we make short shrift ., 这个品种 , 我们能很快解决.
Make的短... ... make short of long 长话短说。 make short shrift of 很快解决, 敷衍了事。 make short work of 很快完成。 除掉。.
you will find , I suspect , that science and technology get shrift in most historians' accounts .我想，你们将会发现科学和技术在大多数历史学家的叙述中受到冷遇。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English scrift 'penance imposed after confession', from shrive

entry.def: If someone or something gets short shrift, they are paid very little attention.

example.ex: The idea has been given short shrift by philosophers.
example.tran: 哲学家们并未怎么关注这一观点。

auth_sentence.content: But it finds short shrift in the Cupula dos Povos.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it finds short shrift in the Cupula dos Povos.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it finds short shrift in the Cupula dos Povos.

auth_sentence.content: Short shrift the science in order to bash belief in God.
auth_sentence.res_content: Short shrift the science in order to bash belief in God.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Short shrift the science in order to bash belief in God.

auth_sentence.content: Vondelpark's debut album could be dealt short shrift by too-eager critical corners.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vondelpark's debut album could be dealt short shrift by too-eager critical corners.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vondelpark's debut album could be dealt short shrift by too-eager critical corners.
